Our company requires a minimum deposit of $1,000 to open an investment account. For premium clients, the minimum threshold is $10,000.
According to AML (anti-money laundering) policy, all transactions over $10,000 are automatically submitted for additional verification within 24 hours.
The bank's credit policy provides for a maximum mortgage term of 30 years. The minimum down payment is 15% of the property value.
The basic 'Conservative' investment portfolio includes 70% bonds and 30% blue-chip stocks. Expected return is 4-6% per annum.
The premium 'Gold' credit card offers 2% cashback on all purchases and free travel insurance when paying for tickets with the card.
In accordance with the regulatory requirements of the Central Bank, all financial advisors must be certified by the Federal Financial Markets Service and undergo annual training.
The privacy policy includes encryption. All client data is encrypted using the AES-256 standard. Data is stored in data centers within the Russian Federation.
The Kapital Financial Group was founded in 1995. Assets under management total 50 billion rubles. Its credit rating from RAEX is AA.
The company is a participant in the deposit insurance system. The maximum insurance indemnity is 1.4 million rubles per depositor.
The investment portfolio management fee is 1% of assets under management for amounts under 1 million rubles and 0.7% for amounts above 1 million rubles.
Free transfers between your accounts in different currencies are available in the mobile app. The fee for external transfers is 0.5% (minimum 50 rubles, maximum 1,000 rubles).
